examples: the scarves were knotted loosely around their throats
synonyms: do up "a long blue scarf was knotted around her waist"

definitions.definition: make (a carpet or other decorative item) with knots.

examples: tangled, tangly, knotty, entangled, matted, snarled, unkempt, uncombed, tousled; mussed up knotted hair

definitions.definition: cause (a muscle) to become tense and hard.
(of the stomach) tighten as a result of nervousness or tension.
